name.japanese: サラサラの実 モデル：アホロートル
name.romanized: Sara Sara no Mi, Moderu: Ahorōtoru

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into an axolotl or axolotl-human hybrid. This fruit was fed to the poisonous gas mass created by Caesar Clown, giving life to Smiley.

users.circumstances: The Devil Fruit was fed to a mass of H2S poison gas using Vegapunk's process of Devil Fruit animation, creating the sentient creature Smiley.

abilityReveals.description: When Smiley died, the Sara Sara no Mi immediately reincarnated into a nearby apple on a sled, transforming it into a Devil Fruit.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: This is the first time in the anime that Devil Fruit reincarnation is shown on-screen, revealing how Devil Fruits are reborn after their user dies.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness to sea water

strengths.description: When fed to the poison gas mass, it gave the gas life and consciousness as Smiley.

description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into various types of gas. Consumed by Caesar Clown.

users.circumstances: Caesar ate the fruit at an unknown time in the past.

abilityReveals.description: Caesar demonstrates his ability to create and control the deadly Shinokuni gas, a petrifying poison that turns victims into ash-like statues.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar transforms Smiley into the Shinokuni weapon, showcasing the deadly potential of his gas manipulation abilities.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness to sea water

strengths.strength: Can create and control various types of poisonous and deadly gases
strengths.description: Caesar can create weapons of mass destruction like Shinokuni using his gas manipulation.
